main event: A witness reported a sighting of a pulsating, circular light object in Kalida, Ohio in April 1967.
interesting points: The object emitted intense, clear, bright light and was observed for about 20 minutes,The witness confirmed it did not disappear while watching,The sighting was corroborated by what appeared to be a family witnessing similar phenomena,The object moved behind and in front of clouds during the sighting,The report indicated that no physical evidence was found related to the sighting.
witness description: the subject is a 17-year-old male from Kalida, Ohio
